CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Vendor__c)), Vendor__r.FirstName + ' ' + Vendor__r.LastName, '') + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Vendor2__c)),', ' + Vendor2__r.FirstName + ' ' + Vendor2__r.LastName, '') + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Vendor3__c)),', ' + Vendor3__r.FirstName + ' ' + Vendor3__r.LastName, '') + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Vendor4__c)),', ' + Vendor4__r.FirstName + ' ' + Vendor4__r.LastName, '') + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Vendor5__c)),', ' + Vendor5__r.FirstName + ' ' + Vendor5__r.LastName, '')
CustomField.label: Vendors
